channel.title: Uke Along Artist » The Rolling Stones

item.title: The Rolling Stones - (I Can't Get No) Satisfaction - Key of C
item.description:
Satisfaction (I Can’t Get No) by The Rolling Stones. It’s been digitally lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C F G
If you found this video useful please subscribe to my channel. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Rolling Stones - Miss You
item.description: Go here for the full play-along with the tab for the melodic riff: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G00cVT64Slk Go here for the full play-along WITHOUT the tab for melodic riff: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WBjxpKto00s

item.title: The Rolling Stones - Miss You - Key of Am
item.description:
Chords: mostly Am & Dm...and minimal F, Em, and E7.
See this link for a video with tab/picking for the melodic riff: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G00cVT64Slk

item.title: The Rolling Stones - Miss You - Key of Am
item.description:
Chords: Am & Dm (mostly)...and minimal F, Em, and E7.
Want to keep it simple? See this link for a video WITHOUT tab/picking for the melodic riff: https://youtu.be/WBjxpKto00s

item.title: The Rolling Stones - Paint It Black - Key of Em
item.description: Chords: Em, B7, D, G, A
